<title level="1" right="Trait">[Munavri](/Traits.aspx?ID=358)</title>

**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 309

Amicable humanoids living in the Darklands, munavris have powerful telekinetic and psychic abilities.
